title: Frederic W. Goudy
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202185909/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202185909/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Frederic W. Goudy**

The preeminent American type designer who had created over 100 classic faces was the Art Director of [Lanston Monotype Company](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202185909/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lanston%20Type%20Co.) from 1920-1947. Thirty of his designs were created specifically for Lanston and all will be available in the near future as a fitting tribute to Goudy’s typographic legacy.
